title: NAFTO
description: WordPress website built and maintained on behalf of the National Association of Field Training Officers
alt: national association of field training officers website

title: 5Wire
description: Full-stack music application that allows the user to create and save their own playlists. Group project using HTML, CSS, BootStrap JavaScript, Spotify API, and MongoDB, deployed on Heroku.

title: Flight Saver
description: Front-end mobile responsive travel website that alows you to search for flights and save them into a search history. It also provides weather and currency exchange information for when and where you are traveling. Group project deployed on Github Pages.

title: Eat the Burger
description: Full-stack application that allows you to create a burger, eat it, and delete it. Created using HTML, CSS, BootStrap, JavaScript, and MySQL, deployed on Heroku.

title: Weather App
description: Front-end weather application that pulls weather data by location. Created with HTML, CSS, BootStrap, JavaScript, and Open Weathermap API.

title: Password Generator
description: A simple password generator with prompts written in javascript that generates a password based on the user's responses to the prompts.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: A Front-end day planner application that allows you to enter and save tasks and appointments for each hour. As each hour passes, the color of the box will change.

title: ReadMe Generator
description: README generator that uses inquirer to ask questions and print the answers to a README document.

title: Employee Tracker
description: A mySQL database of employee information that can be viewed and modified via the server.
